about_the_game:
Incredible arts specially designed to convey tranquility and make you be enchanted by observing the power of life in nature.

Let the desktop of your computer with a unique look!

There are 6 images with 3840 x 2160 pixels and Ultra Wide (2560 x 1080 pixels).

After downloading this add-on will be available in the directory where the game “Hidden Shapes - Animals” is installed, by default, it is (...\Steam\steamapps\common\ Hidden Shapes - Animals \ Hidden Shapes - Animals - Wallpapers).
